<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">[Mage Armor](/Spells.aspx?ID=176)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 348 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

**Bloodline**
[Wyrmblessed](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=17)

**Deities**
[Arshea](/Deities.aspx?ID=113), [Arshea](/Deities.aspx?ID=113), [Demon Bringers](/Deities.aspx?ID=230), [Kazutal](/Deities.aspx?ID=41), [Keepers of the Hearth](/Deities.aspx?ID=248), [Lymnieris](/Deities.aspx?ID=124), [Milani](/Deities.aspx?ID=43), [Valmallos](/Deities.aspx?ID=147), [Vineshvakhi](/Deities.aspx?ID=262), [Wadjet](/Deities.aspx?ID=62)

**Lesson**
[Lesson of Protection](/Lessons.aspx?ID=4)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** until the next time you make your daily preparations
</row>

</column>

---

You ward yourself with shimmering magical energy, gaining a +1 item bonus to AC and a maximum Dexterity modifier of +5. While wearing _mage armor_, you use your unarmored proficiency to calculate your AC.

---
**Heightened (4th)** You gain a +1 item bonus to saving throws.

**Heightened (6th)** The item bonus to AC increases to +2, and you gain a +1 item bonus to saving throws.

**Heightened (8th)** The item bonus to AC increases to +2, and you gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws.

**Heightened (10th)** The item bonus to AC increases to +3, and you gain a +3 item bonus to saving throws.
